title: can't find friend
body: i tried o find him for a few week now but i can't . we are in the same region , in NA. Pls help his name is --snip--

replies.body: I've removed the name for privacy reasons.  We can't share info on other accounts.  They may have removed you or even had a summoner name change.  You can ask any unfamiliar names on your list, but we wouldn't be able to assist here.  :(  Hope you find your friend!
